releases.description:
- Transactions can now be reassigned to a different category during editing
- Small improvements in UI
Recurring transaction templates (experimental). Create up to 3 (Free) or 10 (Pro) templates for transaction suggestions you log on monthly basis. Some improvements under the hood.
Increased per-category limits from 45 to 100 transactions for Pro users.
Fixed crash that occurred when adding income after idle session. Updated app icon for iOS 26 compatibility.Improved delete confirmation dialogs for better clarity.Minor updates to About section.
Category Details view now shows newest transactions first.
Fixed PDF export readability issue when device is set to dark mode.
This initial release brings you a clean, simple way to track your monthly budget without the complexity of other apps.
